sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: You're watching Euronews now. I'm Tecumseh Sulako with your top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Turkey is hosting UN talks between Russian and Ukrainian officials over how to resume grain exports through the Black Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Counting down the Conservatives, Tory MPs are voting to reduce the number of candidates vying to become Britain's next Prime Minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: voting to reduce the number of candidates vying to become Britain's next Prime Minister.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And we'll examine a French government study which warns that people who enjoy eating charcuterie meat have a higher risk of developing cancer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Military delegations from Ukraine, Russia and Turkey are meeting UN officials in Istanbul.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Turkey has previously played a key role in talks between Russia and Ukraine, initially on trying to broker a peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But today they are hoping to set up a potential Black Sea corridor to resume the export of grain from the war-battled country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: export of grain from the war-battered country. Ukraine has struggled to export its goods with many of its ports blocked as war rages along its southern coast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It also accuses Moscow of stealing its grain from farms in the areas its invading troops have captured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Kyiv is pushing for the issue of unblocking Ukrainian grain to be resolved under the auspices of the UN. One idea would be to see that shipments start along specific corridors with Ukrainian vessels guiding grain ships in and out through mined waters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Even if a deal is struck, shipping and insurance companies will require safety reassurances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The talks come at a time of record high food prices globally as the conflict in the world's largest grain supplier has fueled concerns about food security.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Wheat and fertilizer make up nearly a fifth of Ukraine's exports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The coming harvest is also at risk as there's now a shortage of storage space due to the halt in distribution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As Madrid bakes in the unrelenting sun, spare a thought for those who have to work outside.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A sweltering heatwave has put 13 Spanish communities on alert.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In some areas of Galicia, temperatures are predicted to hit 42 degrees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Portugal is also severely affected by high temperatures, which may peak in the coming days. Barely recovered from its previous heat wave, Europe is now facing a difficult weather situation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The statistical model we use for temperature is predicting in some places up to 46 degrees. The national record for Portugal is slightly above 47 degrees in Amarillasia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We don't know if it will break the record. It's a possibility.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Parisians are also feeling the rising mercury.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Authorities recently installed giant sprayers to offer some respite from the heat on the banks of the Seine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's definitely better here than in the heart of the city and it's actually quite nice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There's shade and there's a bit of atmosphere with lots of people and families and you can see the boats going by.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's pretty cool.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Even usually mild Britain can't escape the heat wave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Forecasters have also issued an extreme heat warning for England and Wales, with weekend temperatures predicted to be above 35 degrees in south-east England and 32 degrees elsewhere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Spurred on by scorching temperatures, several wildfires have swept across Portugal's central region, forcing the evacuation of hundreds of locals. Amid the ecological damage is the lives and memories that will be destroyed. The Civil Protection Authority said 300 people were evacuated from several villages in the nearby municipality of Lerilla. Some houses burned down and three motorways closed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Over the border in Spain a wildfire that started in the Las Herdas region has crossed into the province of Salamanca, threatening the Las Bauticas Sierra de Franquia Natural Park. More than 40 firefighters are working to extinguish the blaze, but at the moment it's out of control due to high winds. 400 locals have been evacuated and are now being assisted by the Red Cross. Meanwhile in France, firefighters are working to put out a blaze that has already burned at least 800 hectares of forest in the southwest near Bordeaux.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: High temperatures and winds are again fuelling the situation. Many forests are now under threat. People in the fires wake could lose everything.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Bosnia's Nuretva River is a scenic paradise and a favourite for adventure seekers, but it has taken a decade of court battles and street protests to reach this point.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Last week, a new law banned the construction of more power plants in what is seen as a victory for conservationists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This whole business with small hydropower plants began some 15 years ago when investors started visiting villages and promising prosperity to the local people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Rivers were supposed to be prettified, were supposed to generate significant quantities of clean electricity and local communities were promised it would benefit them greatly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: of clean electricity and local communities were promised it would benefit them greatly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As it turned out, the impact was very harmful. The loss of river water used by people for agriculture, animals and drinking, as well as erosion of forests, soon became visible to the naked eye. The campaign climbs the Balkans is home to over 28,000 kilometers of waterways in pristine or near natural state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: For some, keeping the rivers free of human intervention is a matter of life or death.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Locals here are determined to fight to the end, even if it requires dying.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The new electricity law gives existing concession holders three years to obtain permits as well as the approval of local communities for their projects to proceed a tokyo court has ordered four former directors of the Tokyo Electric Company to pay 95 million

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: euros to a group of investors for the Fukushima nuclear disaster.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The tragedy was the second worst atomic accident in history after an earthquake and tsunami hit the Japanese coast in 2011, causing dozens of deaths.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Twitter is to sue Elon Musk over his decision to pull his $44 billion takeover of the social media giant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The lawsuit accuses the billionaire of making bad faith arguments against Twitter and carrying out public and misleading attacks on the company. The suit has kicked off what could be a long legal saga over the issue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The first vote to find a replacement for Boris Johnson as leader of the Conservative Party and then Prime Minister will be held today. The backbench committee running the election announced 24 hours earlier that only eight of the 11 hopefuls had made it onto the official first round ballot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Depending on who you're speaking to, former Chancellor Rishi Sunak is a bookies favourite, along with Trade Minister Penny Mordaunt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Others say Liz Truss is likely to reach the final round of two.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Today after Prime Minister's question time, candidates must secure at least 30 votes each to make it to the next round, with the result expected by early evening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The leadership race will eventually be whittled down to two candidates by the end of next week, after which they'll have the summer recess to win the support of the Tory membership before the final result on September 5th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The French have decided not everything is good in ham.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In a report released this week, Anne says the French Agency for Food, Environmental and Occupational Health Safety, is formal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: There is a link between nitrites, nitrate and cancer risk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: These additives can be found in 75% of commercialized charcuterie, which allow to prevent the development of bacteria and to lengthen shelf life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: For several years, associations and scientists have been concerned about the health of consumers. And last February, the National French Assembly voted a principle of a trajectory of decrease of the maximum doses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The industry is trying to adapt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Today, France and French professionals apply a maximum amount of nitrite that is 40% lower than the European regulation and with Denmark which had a similar approach we are the two countries with the lowest maximum amounts of nitrite in Europe and certainly in the world the Association food watch and the French League against cancer have already stated that this is not enough they have asked the public authorities to ban these additives the government has announced an action plan to reduce the addition of nitrite components in food products. The

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: text will be presented to Parliament in the fall.
